name: Linku Deta Deployment
description: Open Source URL Shortening Service developed by Valink Solutions (@valink_io) Make sure all of your environment variables are changed properly before running or else run the risk of security issues.

env.description: Application name to be used in the application
Application URL to be used for shortened URLs
Application secret to be used for generating tokens. use a 256-bit key from https://randomkeygen.com/
Admin email to be used for user authentication.
Admin password to be used for user authantication. use a strong password 8+ characters
